input.sentences: we went to the desert to go sight seeing .
we got to a peak with a beautiful view .
we could see for miles around .
it made me feel very mortal .
how thought inspiring the trip was .
output.sentences: The view from up here on top of this mountain is spectacular.
You can see natural rock formations that go on for miles.
This would be a great spot to have a nice picinic lunch.
There are huge cracks in the land that look like it once was filled with water.
From one angle i can see the town or city and roads.
